title: Let's Watch TV: A Castle for Christmas
description:
Joe breaks into the gummies to get through A Castle for Christmas, a new Netflix movie starring Brooke Shields and Cary Elwes. Jeff makes a guest appearance, and Fran knows more about geography than Joe on this final holiday episode of the season!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
